title: Theme Configuration
description: Design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and animations

specs.given: a theme with only colors defined
specs.then: it should accept colors as the only design token

specs.given: a theme with colors and fonts configured
specs.then: it should support color palette and typography system

specs.given: a theme with colors, fonts, and spacing
specs.then: it should provide visual identity, typography, and layout tokens

specs.given: a complete theme with all 7 design token categories
specs.then: it should orchestrate colors, fonts, spacing, animations, breakpoints, shadows, and borderRadius

specs.given: a theme with breakpoints matching responsive system
specs.then: it should ensure consistency between theme and responsive.schema.json

specs.given: a theme with animations matching interaction system
specs.then: it should provide animations reusable in interactions.schema.json

specs.given: a theme following design system best practices
specs.when: all tokens use semantic naming and progressive scales
specs.then: it should enable consistent UI across entire application

specs.when: spacing and other values use Tailwind syntax
specs.then: it should integrate seamlessly with Tailwind CSS
